Welcome in town ! May I be of assistance?
Good luck!
Welcome to my car company! Can I help you?
Come again sometime!
Yes, this is the Coal Power Plant.
Have fun, I guess.
Hello! Can our establishment help you in any way?
I hope to have been of assistance to you. Goodbye!
Underwater Wildlife Protectors, at your service!
Thank you for your time!
Hey, taking a hike in the woods?
Stay safe out there!
You are looking at the CERN. Can they provide you with anything?
We kindly appreciate your patronage.
Need anythin' from the Iron Mine?
See ya.
Hi, can I help you ?
See you around!
Thanks! Now I just need electricity!
Thanks! Now I just need budget!
Hoho, this should lighten up the mood for our citizens!
Thanks! Now I just need green electricity!
Thanks! Now I just need money!
The city council should gladly greenlight this energy proposal!
We should never lose track of our transportation systems... Hoho!
Thanks! Now I just need vegetable garden!
Thanks! Now I just need budget!
If I ever thought you could have a garden on your own roof...
Thanks! Now I just need some fruit basket!
Thanks! Now I just need budget!
Rejoice, everyone: The fruit market is now open for business!
Thanks! Now I just need seed!
Thanks! Now I just need budget!
I can already see the green city award from here...
Thanks! Now I just need battery!
Clean cars? If I had more funds, sure, I'd do it!
Clean cars? Yeah, let's stop polluting!
Thanks! Now I just need green battery!
Even cleaner cars? I like the sound of that, let's get more funding!
Even cleaner cars? We're doing this. Right now!
Thanks! Now I just need carcass!
Thanks! Now I just need money!
With the local Iron Mine as our supplier, we can finally open shop!
Thanks! Now I just need windturbine!
Alright, as soon as we have the money, the energy transition begins!
Renewable energy, here we come!
Do you need something ?
The planet need something!
Why ?
Actually forests are decreasing because we use wood to produce energy...
Will a wind turbine system helps you ?
Yes a lot but we can't make it here!
I will find you the solution!
Oh really? Thanks! Find the iron mine, they may could help you!

You're heading towards the mountains. The cold snow feels nice...
Over there's the desert! The obelisks give a cool, ancient touch to the place!
This way to Neo New Ville! Check out the CERN, it's a cool building!
We should stop extracting oil in the sea; Just look at the water...
Electric cars would be a nice change around here.
I learnt so much about SDGs in the SDG tab, you should take a look too!
If you ever feel lost, just open up your Quest Log!
The city would be so much better off with a new electricity wiring system...
Fruits aren't just tasty: Transform them and you'll see how useful they can get!
You shouldn't put entire companies in danger just to help others...
The more intel you gather, the better you understand what needs to be done!
Check out the signs all over town for extra info!
Welcome! All inhabitants of the planet will be happy to share their knowledge with you!
Economy, forest levels, pollution levels and citizen mood are all connected!
Try to upgrade everything at the same time: Don't let economy crush the planet's health!
You can check how the planet's doing at any time by zooming out.
You'll need to use all 3 of your characters together to solve problems!
Gather useful information with the help of the NGOs!
Transform Items with the Entrepreneur character's abilities, and give them to who needs'em!
The government character can balance out funding between infrastructures!
If you ever feel lost, just open up your Quest Log! Also, go check out the Coal Power Plant.
This town needs some greenery! Like fruits, or something...
Nothing like a good walk in the park! Head east to reach the mountains.
Check out the signs all over town for extra info!
We must find a way to create renewable energy to safeguard the forest.
Such dirty water... Gives me shivers all over...
Over there is Hillside, the montainous hotspot!
Neo New Ville's just South of here!
I learnt so much about SDGs in the SDG tab, you should take a look too!
If you ever feel lost, just open up your Quest Log!
You shouldn't put entire companies in danger just to help others...
You can know how a city is doing economically just by looking at the streets and citizens
You can check how the planet's doing at any time by zooming out.
